Project Structure
=================

Overview of main directories and files.

Directories
-----------

- `notebooks/`: Google Colab notebooks
- `data/`: Sample images and training data
- `scripts/`: Utility scripts for tiling, ML, and exporting
- `docs/`: This documentation

Important Files
---------------

- `main.py`: Symmetry generation entry point
- `ml4kids_utils.py`: Interface with ML4Kids models
- `README.md`: High-level overview
